fmt.Println("When is Sunday?")
    today := time.Now().Weekday()
    switch time.Sunday {

        fmt.Println("It's today!")

        fmt.Println("It's tomorrow!")
    case today + 2:
        fmt.Println("It's in two days!")
    default:
        fmt.Println("It's too far away!")
    }
